articles.title: King Charles unadorned new stamp design revealed
articles.description: Royal Mail reveals the minimalist image that will appear on stamps from 4 April.
articles.content:
The image of King Charles III that is to appear on new stamps from 4 April has been revealed by the Royal Mail.
The minimalist, unadorned picture, with no crown on the stamp or any other decoration,… [+2781 chars]
